description: The talk will showcase how the Python community started and took off in Bloomberg, and how it can serve as a model that can be used within other companies as well. This includes details on how Bloomberg's Python community got started and grew to the place that it is today, as well as tips from its leaders personal experiences.
title: Growing a Python Community at an Enterprise Scale
